mapper.select: SELECT f.fid,a.`name` aname,d.`name` dname,appointtime,appointmenttime,f.phone FROM a_forward f INNER JOIN a_user a ON f.auser = a.username INNER JOIN d_user d ON d.username = f.duser WHERE d.username = #{doctorName} and f.show=1 and appointmenttime LIKE #{link}

SELECT f.fid,a.`name` as auser,d.`name` as duser,appointtime,appointmenttime,f.phone FROM a_forward f INNER JOIN a_user a ON f.auser = a.username INNER JOIN d_user d ON d.username = f.duser WHERE d.username = #{doctorName} and f.show=1
